benchmark_details.name: SciEvo (Scientific Evolution)
benchmark_details.overview: SciEvo is a longitudinal scientometric dataset with over two million academic publications, providing comprehensive contents information and citation graphs to support cross-disciplinary analyses over 30 years.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and continuously updating dataset for longitudinal scientometric analysis across multiple disciplines.

data.annotation: Automatically extracted using natural language processing models

methodology.calculation: Citations are analyzed to measure topical and temporal diversity.
methodology.interpretation: High citation diversity indicates interdisciplinary collaboration and comprehensive knowledge integration.
methodology.validation: The dataset consists of papers from arXiv, ensuring broad representation across disciplines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: No personal data included; focuses on publications.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Complies with arXivâ€™s API usage policy.
